name: Mondstadt: The City of Wind and Song

achievements.name: Continental Explorer: Mondstadt
achievements.desc: Light up the entire Mondstadt map (excluding the Dragonspine area).

achievements.name: Brush of a Thousand Winds
achievements.desc: Unlock all Teleport Waypoints in Mondstadt (excludes the Dragonspine area).

achievements.name: Let the Wind Lead
achievements.desc: Upgrade the Statues of The Seven in Mondstadt to their maximum level.

achievements.name: Sanctuary Pilgrim: Mondstadt
achievements.desc: Unlock all the Shrines of Depths in Mondstadt.

achievements.name: Guiding Wind
achievements.desc: Follow 10 Seelie in Mondstadt to their Seelie Courts (excludes the Dragonspine area).

achievements.name: Guiding Wind
achievements.desc: Follow 20 Seelie in Mondstadt to their Seelie Courts (excludes the Dragonspine area).

achievements.name: Guiding Wind
achievements.desc: Follow 40 Seelie in Mondstadt to their Seelie Courts (excludes the Dragonspine area).

achievements.name: Wind-Chasing Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 100 chests in Mondstadt (excluding the Dragonspine area).

achievements.name: Wind-Chasing Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 200 chests in Mondstadt (excluding the Dragonspine area).

achievements.name: Wind-Chasing Treasure Hunter
achievements.desc: Open 400 chests in Mondstadt (excluding the Dragonspine area).

achievements.name: Wind-Chasing Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 5 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Mondstadt (excludes the Dragonspine area).

achievements.name: Wind-Chasing Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 10 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Mondstadt (excludes the Dragonspine area).

achievements.name: Wind-Chasing Adventurer
achievements.desc: Complete 15 Open World mechanism-activated Time Trial Challenges in Mondstadt (excludes the Dragonspine area).
